ygData.subject: Re: Rangers and warriors
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok here s my opinion. I started a warrior because that is my favorite class. I like to fight monsters and such, and I love to use a sword. In pen and paper
ygData.messageBody:
Ok here's my opinion. I started a warrior because that is my favorite class.
I like to fight monsters and such, and I love to use a sword. In pen and
paper games I am usually a ranger or a thief because in those games it's
really not about the type of character you play, but how you play them.
Anyways, let's just say I am not really too happy with the way that warriors
(especially humans) play in EQ. I never played anything else, but there was
something that was lacking. I made a ranger today and by level 3 I was
loving him. There are so many more advantages. First, being able to pick who
you fight with tracking...Then elves have stats better than humans
anyways...add to that the fact that they are EXTREMELY simalar in combat,
PLUS have spells. People are arguing that the spells they have suck, and
that they will never be more than 80% of max and blah blah blah....Who
cares??!? Warriors don't get spells at all, and if you want 100% be a mage!
Well, I am not abandoning my warrior just yet, but I will be splitting a lot
of time with my ranger to see how things even out.

Tyveris,
Aspiring Samurai
